title: IceCube LVK Alert Nu Track Search
description: IceCube LVK Coincident Neutrino Track Search

type.description: IceCube LVK Alert Nu Track Search

pval_generic.description: P-value from generic transient search; consistency with background expectations [0-1]

significance_generic.description: Significance from generic transient search in sigmas; not corrected for number of searches

pval_bayesian.description: P-value from LLAMA bayesian search; consistency with background expectations [0-1]

significance_bayesian.description: Significance from LLAMA bayesian search in sigmas; not corrected for number of searches

n_events_coincident.description: Number of IceCube events in spatial and temporal coincidence with the GW map

coincident_events.description: An array of summary of information for each coincident neutrino track event

sensitivity_energy_range.description: Energy sensitivity range assuming an E^-2 spectrum (E^2 dN/dE) within the GW map localization

event_dt.description: Time difference between LVK alert time and neutrino candidate [sec]

event_pval_generic.description: Per-event P-value from generic transient search; consistency with background expectations [0-1]

event_pval_bayesian.description: Per-event P-value from LLAMA bayesian search; consistency with background expectations [0-1]
